speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Nay, keep your way, little gallant. You

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: were wont to be a follower, but now you are a

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: leader. Whether had you rather—lead mine eyes,

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: or eye your master’s heels?

speaker: ROBIN
text: I had rather, forsooth, go before you like a man

speaker: ROBIN
text: than follow him like a dwarf.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: O, you are a flattering boy! Now I see

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: you’ll be a courtier.

speaker: FORD
text: Well met, Mistress Page. Whither go you?

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Truly, sir, to see your wife. Is she at

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: home?

speaker: FORD
text: Ay, and as idle as she may hang together, for

speaker: FORD
text: want of company. I think if your husbands were

speaker: FORD
text: dead, you two would marry.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Be sure of that—two other husbands.

speaker: FORD
text: Where had you this pretty weathercock?

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: I cannot tell what the dickens his name

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: is my husband had him of.—What do you call your

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: knight’s name, sirrah?

speaker: ROBIN
text: Sir John Falstaff.

speaker: FORD
text: Sir John Falstaff!

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: He, he. I can never hit on ’s name.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: There is such a league between my goodman and

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: he. Is your wife at home indeed?

speaker: FORD
text: Indeed, she is.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: By your leave, sir. I am sick till I see

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: her.

speaker: FORD
text: Has Page any brains? Hath he any eyes? Hath

speaker: FORD
text: he any thinking? Sure they sleep; he hath no use

speaker: FORD
text: of them. Why, this boy will carry a letter twenty

speaker: FORD
text: mile as easy as a cannon will shoot point-blank

speaker: FORD
text: twelve score. He pieces out his wife’s inclination.

speaker: FORD
text: He gives her folly motion and advantage. And now

speaker: FORD
text: she’s going to my wife, and Falstaff’s boy with her.

speaker: FORD
text: A man may hear this shower sing in the wind. And

speaker: FORD
text: Falstaff’s boy with her! Good plots they are laid,

speaker: FORD
text: and our revolted wives share damnation together.

speaker: FORD
text: Well, I will take him, then torture my wife, pluck

speaker: FORD
text: the borrowed veil of modesty from the so-seeming

speaker: FORD
text: Mistress Page, divulge Page himself for a secure

speaker: FORD
text: and willful Acteon, and to these violent proceedings

speaker: FORD
text: all my neighbors shall cry aim.

speaker: FORD
text: The clock gives me my cue, and my assurance

speaker: FORD
text: bids me search. There I shall find Falstaff. I

speaker: FORD
text: shall be rather praised for this than mocked, for it

speaker: FORD
text: is as positive as the earth is firm that Falstaff is

speaker: FORD
text: there. I will go.

speaker:
SHALLOW
              ,
               
              PAGE
              ,
               
              ETC
              .
text: Well met, Master Ford.

speaker: FORD
text: Trust me, a good knot. I have good cheer at

speaker: FORD
text: home, and I pray you all go with me.

speaker: SHALLOW
text: I must excuse myself, Master Ford.

speaker: SLENDER
text: And so must I, sir. We have appointed to dine

speaker: SLENDER
text: with Mistress Anne, and I would not break with

speaker: SLENDER
text: her for more money than I’ll speak of.

speaker: SHALLOW
text: We have lingered about a match between

speaker: SHALLOW
text: Anne Page and my cousin Slender, and this day we

speaker: SHALLOW
text: shall have our answer.

speaker: SLENDER
text: I hope I have your good will, Father Page.

speaker: PAGE
text: You have, Master Slender. I stand wholly for

speaker: PAGE
text: you.—But my wife, Master Doctor, is for you

speaker: PAGE
text: altogether.

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: Ay, be-gar, and de maid is love-a me! My

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: nursh-a Quickly tell me so mush.

speaker: HOST
text: What say you to young Master Fenton?

speaker: HOST
text: He capers, he dances, he has eyes of youth, he

speaker: HOST
text: writes verses, he speaks holiday, he smells April

speaker: HOST
text: and May. He will carry ’t, he will carry ’t. ’Tis in his

speaker: HOST
text: buttons he will carry ’t.

speaker: PAGE
text: Not by my consent, I promise you. The gentleman

speaker: PAGE
text: is of no having. He kept company with the

speaker: PAGE
text: wild Prince and Poins. He is of too high a region;

speaker: PAGE
text: he knows too much. No, he shall not knit a knot in

speaker: PAGE
text: his fortunes with the finger of my substance. If he

speaker: PAGE
text: take her, let him take her simply. The wealth I have

speaker: PAGE
text: waits on my consent, and my consent goes not that

speaker: PAGE
text: way.

speaker: FORD
text: I beseech you heartily, some of you go home

speaker: FORD
text: with me to dinner. Besides your cheer, you shall

speaker: FORD
text: have sport: I will show you a monster. Master Doctor,

speaker: FORD
text: you shall go.—So shall you, Master Page.—

speaker: FORD
text: And you, Sir Hugh.

speaker: SHALLOW
text: Well, fare you well. We shall have the freer

speaker: SHALLOW
text: wooing at Master Page’s.

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: Go home, John Rugby. I come anon.

speaker: HOST
text: Farewell, my hearts. I will to my honest knight

speaker: HOST
text: Falstaff, and drink canary with him.

speaker: FORD
text: I think I shall drink in pipe-wine first

speaker: FORD
text: with him; I’ll make him dance.—Will you go,

speaker: FORD
text: gentles?

speaker:
PAGE
              ,
               
              DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
              ,
               
              and
               
              SIR
               
              HUGH
text: Have with you to

speaker:
PAGE
              ,
               
              DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
              ,
               
              and
               
              SIR
               
              HUGH
text: see this monster.
